content:
In this dataset, people are asked how polite they believe the text to be. 0 means polite, while 25 is impolite.

Now you will make your prediction (if you are unsure, just give your best estimate.) Your output should be an integer label:
Target Example:
Text: I don't think I've used it in Wikipedia.  So, if I haven't, why did you bring it up?
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer and nothing else.
